response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an opportunity not only to save $1,000 but also to secure a high-quality product that aligns perfectly with your requirements. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to serve you.", "product_price": 11000}
